sentence: The image displays a tutorial screen from the "Emoji Trolls" app by DreamWorks.
sentence_cn: 该图显示的是梦工厂出品的“Emoji Trolls”应用程序的教程屏幕。

sentence: The background features cartoonish hair motifs of various vibrant colors, suggestive of the Trolls theme.
sentence_cn: 背景以各种鲜艳色彩的卡通头发图案为特色，暗示了巨魔的主题。

sentence: "Within Emoji Trolls, tap the emoji you want to share and then select your favorite app to share with."
sentence_cn: “在 Emoji Trolls 中，点击您想要分享的表情符号，然后选择您最喜欢的应用程序进行分享。”
words: Within Emoji Trolls, tap the emoji you want to share and then select your favorite app to share with.

sentence: Below the text, there's an option to choose an app to share an emoji.
sentence_cn: 在文本下方，有一个选项可以选择一个应用程序来分享表情符号。

sentence: At the top of the screen are app icons and the "Emoji Trolls" logo, and at the bottom is a menu bar with possible selections.
sentence_cn: 屏幕顶部是应用程序图标和“Emoji Trolls”标志，底部是带有可选选项的菜单栏。
